org.tigr.antware.shared.util
Class SendMail

java.lang.Object
  org.tigr.antware.shared.util.SendMail

public class SendMail
extends Object

The class SendMail is a utility class that provides methods to send an email using the mail client.

send

public int send(String address,
                String subject,
                String message)
         throws InterruptedException,
                IOException,
                RuntimeException
The send method executes the specified script or executable program. The scriptshould be have a fully qualified path or can be found in the path

Parameters:
scriptName - a String value for the script name or executable name
Returns:
an int value of 0 if the script retruns 0, otherwise returns the return value of the script
Throws:
InterruptedException - if the execution thread is interrupted
IOException - if an error occurs creating the process to run the script, or an error occurs writing to the error or output streams
RuntimeException - if the the return value is not zero

main

public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws InterruptedException,
                        IOException
The main method is used to invoke this class from the command line for debugging.

Parameters:
args - a String[] value containing the script name to run
Throws:
InterruptedException
IOException
